name: The Hunter (English version)
description: The Hunter is a small rpg-style game built with Twine. In this story, you are a young Hunter who needs to fight monsters in order to become one day a Master Hunter. At the beginning, you’re welcoming by Hawk the hunter's chief of the Village who can also give you some informations about objects you'll find by fighting. You have to improve your Stats to reach the end of the game. You have 3 locations to explore in the whole game. But be careful with your level and don't forget to save your game as often as possible ! Remember you can restore your Life whenever you want ! So take care and listen to any advices !
